name: Fanmade Fallout Terminal minigame
description:
Currently in development

This is a fanmade project of the Fallout Terminal minigame. The idea is having an infinite minigame for those who loved solving them in the Fallout franchise games. I will be adding more words and updates to the game in the future.

Current features
  • Random generation of character rows
  • Random insertion of words to guess
  • Currently hovered word detection and appearing into the terminal
Pending features to develop
  • Random word picking and comparing to selected word
  • Player feedback, showing selected word correct characters
  • Game loop, with win and lose conditions
  • Visual effects for the words to appear when selected
  • Sound effects for click, hover and select
  • Word removal and attempts restoration on braced elements selection
  • Infinite game: restart on game over
  • Adding more words to the game to make it replayable
